Articles.Content: Yes! The first aircraft carrier is operational. And the craft are SSTO capable!
That looks awesome, can you release a .craft file for the carrier?
Wow.. what kind of FPS are you getting from that?
Very cleaver, using STOL or VTOL planes ... I wanna know, can you build something like that for FAR or NEAR capable planes?

Hey, don't mean to necropost but do you have a craft file for this? This is really amazing Ã¢â‚¬â€ I tried building an aircraft carrier with wing parts and found it took too much tinkering to try it. I also didn't use the plates like you did, which I assume adds increased resistance to explosions from hard landings.

All in all, your design looks very smooth and clean, and I like it. The batteries in on the deck look sweet.

Love it! This forum needs MOAR aircraft carriers! SSTOs on a carrier is cool, too! What's the part count?

Overall, really neat, good job!

i had a 3000+ parts aircraft carrier that could carry full sized regular planes with a deck of 250m' and it was very tall i might make mroe carriers once bigger wings come out it was also fast 20+ m/s but the part count and the "realistic" shape were too much for my PC to hadle

How many parts?
Will you be posting a craft file ?
